org.gvsig.fmap.mapcontext.rendering.legend

Interface ILegend

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, Legend, Persistent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DynamicVectorLegend, IClassifiedLegend, IClassifiedRasterLegend, IClassifiedVectorLegend, IRasterLegend, ISingleSymbolLegend, IVectorialIntervalLegend, IVectorialUniqueValueLegend, IVectorLegend, RasterLegend, VectorComplexLegend
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractClassifiedVectorLegend, AbstractIntervalLegend, AbstractLegend, AbstractVectorialLegend, ColorTableLegend, DefaultDynamicVectorLegend, DefaultVectorComplexLegend, ImageLegend, SingleSymbolLegend, VectorialIntervalLegend, VectorialUniqueValueLegend

    public interface ILegend
extends Legend
    Information about the legend to be represented in the interface.
